analysis.key_quote: Changing career civil servants to political appointees will --- first --- cause an exodus of people with decades and decades of experience who will be replaced by wet behind the years political appointees with no expertise and probably no interest to acquire that expertise.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the transformation of career civil servants into political appointees, highlighting concerns about the loss of expertise, the deterioration of government services, and the politicization of the civil service, which aligns with the themes of merit-based system concerns and politicization.
